title: Böyük Kəsik
description: Chalcolithic settlement in modern Azerbaijan. The settlement was oval shaped and was 1.2 hectares in area, but the top layers were destroyed and the lower layers are not visible due to ongoing agriculture on the site.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Böyük Kəsik after Müseyibli 2007.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Böyük Kəsik
